parameters.query: SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_id = '{{ $json.file_id }}' AND mime_type LIKE 'image/%'

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: Analyze this image and provide: 1) A detailed description, 2) List of objects detected, 3) Scene type (indoor/outdoor/document/screenshot/etc), 4) Any visible text, 5) Suggested tags for organization, 6) Quality assessment. Format as JSON.

parameters.query: INSERT INTO image_analysis (file_id, description, detected_objects, scene_type, has_text, extracted_text, quality_score, analysis_timestamp) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8) ON CONFLICT (file_id) DO UPDATE SET description = $2, detected_objects = $3, scene_type = $4, has_text = $5, extracted_text = $6, quality_score = $7, analysis_timestamp = $8
INSERT INTO file_suggestions (file_id, suggestion_type, suggested_value, reason, confidence, status) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, 'pending')
